name: Star Girl Chic Boutique
description:
Ever wondered what it'd be like to wake up from the mundane, and follow you dreams?

That's exactly what happens in the Chic Boutique, the next entry in the Star Girl Universe!

You've taken the leap, and went from ideas to actions, opening your very own boutique. Although you're starting small, you're starting! And it's up to you to progress, and grow. Travel the city, open new boutiques, and serve all of the fashionistas who want the very best in taste and style.

Features:
*You're in this for the rewards; manage your staff to serve as many customers as possible
*Hire more staff, Level them up, and upgrade your facilities
*Daily Log-In bonuses, with big rewards for long term players
*Use Power-Up items, to grant bonuses like extra speed, and double awards
*Events: Each day there will be a new Event, a playable stage which grants triple rewards on all currencies!
*Want an extra challenge? Increase the game speed, see how you handle rush hour!

** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience. **
